text: Li Yaowen (; 1 May 1918 â€“ 10 April 2018) was a general in the People's Liberation Army of China. He was an alternate member of the 11th CPC Central Committee, a member of the 12th CPC Central Committee, and a member of the Central Advisory Commission. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Infectious disease deaths in China Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Chinese military people Category:20th-century Chinese politicians Category:Ambassadors of China Category:20th-century Chinese military people
